snippet: Yorkville Endoscopy, the Manhattan clinic where Joan Rivers went into cardiac arrest while being treated for a voice problem, will lose those benefits effective on Jan. 31, the letter said.
lead_paragraph: Yorkville Endoscopy, the Manhattan clinic where Joan Rivers went into cardiac arrest while being treated for a voice problem, will lose those benefits effective on Jan. 31, the letter said.

headline.main: Letter From the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services Ending Federal Benefits to Yorkville Endoscopy

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
